attributes.action: Make all sports clubs free of charge for Children under the age of 15.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that all children under the age of 15 should be given a chance to try out as many sports as they want (within reason, i.e. sky diving is unsuitable)

However one major problem is that you tend to have to sign a membership for most clubs. This can hamper the hopes of many children if their parents can not afford to pay.

With all sports clubs free for the under 15's then the Government can help fight child obesity as it will encourage all children to take part in a sport and thereby encourage a healthy life.

It could also encourage young people to stay off the streets and continue taking part in sports after 15.
